Package com.github.siroshun09.mccommand.common.sender

Interface Sender

All Known Subinterfaces:
ConsoleSender
All Known Implementing Classes:
BukkitConsole, BukkitSender, BungeeConsole, BungeeSender
public interface Sender
Interface that wraps a CommandSender that is different on different platforms.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    @NotNull String getName()
    Gets the name of the command sender.
    @NotNull UUID getUUID()
    Gets the UUID of the command sender.
    boolean hasPermission​(@NotNull String perm)
    Checks if the Sender has the requested permission.
    default boolean isConsole()
    Checks if the sender is console.
    boolean isOnline()
    Checks if the sender is online.
    void sendMessage​(@NotNull String message)
    Send a message.

  • Method Details

    • getUUID

      @NotNull @NotNull UUID getUUID()
      Gets the UUID of the command sender.

      If it is internal sender, returns ConsoleSender.CONSOLE_UUID.

      Returns:
      sender's UUID.

    • getName

      @NotNull @NotNull String getName()
      Gets the name of the command sender.

      If it is internal sender, returns ConsoleSender.CONSOLE_NAME.

      Returns:
      sender's name.

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage​(@NotNull @NotNull String message)
      Send a message.

      This method does not colorize.

      Parameters:
      message - message to send.

    • hasPermission

      boolean hasPermission​(@NotNull @NotNull String perm)
      Checks if the Sender has the requested permission.
      Parameters:
      perm - a permission.
      Returns:
      true if the sender have permission, false otherwise

    • isOnline

      boolean isOnline()
      Checks if the sender is online.
      Returns:
      true if the sender is online, false otherwise.

    • isConsole

      default boolean isConsole()
      Checks if the sender is console.
      Returns:
      true if the sender is console, false otherwise.
